<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Harrow Spellcards](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2178)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 112 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 475 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crafted of sturdy paper, each card of this [harrow deck](/Equipment.aspx?ID=824) showcases a beautiful watercolor illustration with space to inscribe a spell below. When shuffled, its cards seem to fly between one another of their own accord.

<document level="2" id="action-1675" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Harrow Spellcards
